question: After the Permanent Settlement of Bengal in 1793, Santhals relocated their settlement in which of the following places?
explanation: Originally, the Santhals belonged to the deep forest of Bankura, Midnapore, Birbhum, Manbhum, Chhotanagpur, Palamu areas. After the Permanent Settlement of Bengal in 1793, Santhals relocated their settlement in the plains of the Rajmahal hills.
